name: Signs
tagline: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.

name: Hancock
tagline: A hard-living superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public enters into a questionable relationship with the wife of the public relations professional who's trying to repair his image.

name: The Bourne Ultimatum
tagline: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

name: Rush Hour 2
tagline: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

name: WALL·E
tagline: In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

name: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
tagline: Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booth's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
tagline: The world famous singing pre-teen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

name: Mrs. Doubtfire
tagline: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

name: Beauty and the Beast
tagline: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.

name: Ted
tagline: As the result of a childhood wish, John Bennett's teddy bear, Ted, came to life and has been by John's side ever since - a friendship that's tested when Lori, John's girlfriend of four years, wants more from their relationship.

name: King Kong
tagline: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.

name: Ghost
tagline: After being killed during a botched mugging, a man's love for his partner enables him to remain on earth as a ghost.

name: The Da Vinci Code
tagline: A murder inside the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years -- which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

name: How to Train Your Dragon
tagline: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

name: Aladdin
tagline: Aladdin, a street urchin, accidentally meets Princess Jasmine, who is in the city undercover. They love each other, but she can only marry a prince.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
tagline: A struggling songwriter named Dave Seville finds success when he comes across a trio of singing chipmunks: mischievous leader Alvin, brainy Simon, and chubby, impressionable Theodore.

name: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
tagline: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a traveling circus, which they reinvent - Madagascar style.

name: Saving Private Ryan
tagline: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: Mission: Impossible II

production.name: Munich Film Partners & Company (MFP) MI2 Productions

tagline: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera"

name: Kung Fu Panda
tagline: In the Valley of Peace, Po the Panda finds himself chosen as the Dragon Warrior despite the fact that he is obese and a complete novice at martial arts.

name: X2
tagline: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.

name: The Lorax
tagline: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

name: Austin Powers in Goldmember
tagline: Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly-named villain Goldmember - who is working with Dr. Evil.

name: Back to the Future
tagline: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.
King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

name: Fast Five
tagline: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
tagline: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

name: Wedding Crashers
tagline: John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

name: Sherlock Holmes
tagline: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

name: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
tagline: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

name: Ratatouille
tagline: A rat, who can also cook, makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

name: Thor: The Dark World
tagline: When Jane Foster is possessed by a great power, Thor must protect her from a new threat of old times: the Dark Elves.

name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
tagline: Dr. Evil is back...and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 60's and steal Austin Powers's mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

name: Batman Begins
tagline: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
tagline: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.

name: World War Z
tagline: United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.

name: The Mummy Returns
tagline: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

name: Armageddon
tagline: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

name: Tangled
tagline: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

name: Superman Returns
tagline: After a long visit to the lost remains of the planet Krypton, the Man of Steel returns to Earth to become the people's savior once again and reclaim the love of Lois Lane.

name: Gone with the Wind
tagline: A manipulative Southern belle carries on a turbulent affair with a blockade runner during the American Civil War.

name: Pearl Harbor
tagline: Pearl Harbor follows the story of two best friends, Rafe and Danny, and their love lives as they go off to join the war.

name: Monsters vs. Aliens
tagline: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

name: Happy Feet
tagline: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
tagline: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis.

name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
tagline: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
tagline: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the Ice Age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the wooly mammoths.

name: Madagascar
tagline: Spoiled by their upbringing with no idea what wild life is really like, four animals from New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar, among a bunch of merry lemurs

name: Cars 2
tagline: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

name: Twilight
tagline: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.

name: Men in Black II
tagline: Agent J needs help so he is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory.

name: Wreck-It Ralph
tagline: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

name: Gladiator
tagline: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

name: The Croods
tagline: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
tagline: Sherlock Holmes and his sidekick Dr. Watson join forces to outwit and bring down their fiercest adversary, Professor Moriarty.

name: The Day After Tomorrow
tagline: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek across America to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
tagline: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
tagline: Snow White, pursued by a jealous queen, hides with the Dwarfs; the queen feeds her a poison apple, but Prince Charming awakens her with a kiss.

name: Dances with Wolves
tagline: Lt. John Dunbar, exiled to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

name: Batman Forever
tagline: Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amourous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

name: The Fugitive
tagline: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt.

name: Ocean's Eleven
tagline: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

name: The Simpsons Movie
tagline: After Homer accidentally pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpson family are declared fugitives.

name: What Women Want
tagline: After an accident, a chauvenistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

name: The Perfect Storm
tagline: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

name: Lincoln
tagline: As the Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield and as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.

name: Liar Liar
tagline: A fast track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after the lawyer turns his son down for the last time.

name: Jurassic Park III
tagline: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Alan Grant to go to Isla Sorna (the second InGen dinosaur lab.), resulting in an unexpected landing...and unexpected new inhabitants on the island.

name: Thor
tagline: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

name: Mission: Impossible
tagline: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

name: Planet of the Apes
tagline: An Air Force astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
tagline: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.

name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
tagline: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Weapon and the impact it will have on his later years.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
tagline: After arriving in India, Indiana Jones is asked by a desperate village to find a mystical stone. He agrees, and stumbles upon a secret cult plotting a terrible plan in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

name: Top Gun
tagline: As students at the Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young flyer learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

name: Men in Black 3
tagline: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

name: Pretty Woman
tagline: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

name: Hitch
tagline: While helping his latest client woo the fine lady of his dreams, a professional "date doctor" finds that his game doesn't quite work on the gossip columnist with whom he's smitten.

name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
tagline: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

name: Tootsie
tagline: An unemployed actor with a reputation for being difficult disguises himself as a woman to get a role in a soap opera.

name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
tagline: A substance, designed to help the brain repair itself, gives rise to a super-intelligent chimp who leads an ape uprising.

name: Captain America: The First Avenger
tagline: After being deemed unfit for military service, Steve Rogers volunteers for a top secret research project that turns him into Captain America, a superhero dedicated to defending USA ideals.

name: The Karate Kid
tagline: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

name: There's Something About Mary
tagline: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from highschool, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

name: Ice Age
tagline: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

name: The Bourne Supremacy
tagline: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

name: Crocodile Dundee
tagline: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
tagline: One year after Kevin was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself in New York City, and the same criminals are not far behind.

name: Elf

production.name: Guy Walks into a Bar Productions

tagline: After inadvertently wreaking havoc on the elf community due to his ungainly size, a man raised as an elf at the North Pole is sent to the U.S. in search of his true identity.

name: National Treasure
tagline: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

name: Rain Man
tagline: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

name: Air Force One
tagline: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

name: TRON: Legacy
tagline: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

name: The Matrix
tagline: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: Tarzan
tagline: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

name: True Grit
tagline: A tough U.S. Marshal helps a stubborn young woman track down her father's murderer.

name: A Beautiful Mind
tagline: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

name: Chicago
tagline: Murderesses Velma Kelly (a chanteuse and tease who killed her husband and sister after finding them in bed together) and Roxie Hart (who killed her boyfriend when she discovered he wasn't going to make her a star) find themselves on death row together and fight for the fame that will keep them from the gallows in 1920s Chicago.

name: The Help
tagline: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African-American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

name: Bridesmaids
tagline: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.
